meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Daniel Lubin Michael Kannellos Steven Popper Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #834.

td.p: Daniel Lubin, a business consultant from San Pedro, California
Michael Kannellos, a freelance lawyer and writer from West Hollywood, California
Steven Popper, an economist originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota (whose 3-day cash winnings total $31,400)

tr.td: MEXICO
WINTER SONGS
DRUGSTORE
"LINE"s
SPORTS
THE SMALLEST

Mike
')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '1st major battle with heavy causalities was at this Tennessee site named for a church on the battlefield')

tr.td: THE CIVIL WAR
1st major battle with heavy causalities was at this Tennessee site named for a church on the battlefield
Steven
Mike
Dan
4-day champion: $42,600
2nd place: a trip for 2 to Acapulco+Jeopardy! box game
3rd place: Galaxy carpet+Jeopardy! box game
Steven
Mike
Dan

23 R
(including 2 DDs),
7 W
